t: Hyundai Motor: First auto brand available for purchase on Amazon Autos - KED Global
s: January 8, 2025 - Hyundai Motor America, the US affiliate of South Korea’s top automaker Hyundai Motor Co., said on Wednesday it is now selling cars directly on Amazon, including popular electric vehicles such as the 2025 model of the IONIQ 5, the IONIQ 6 sedan and the soon-to-be-launched IONIQ 9.

t: You can buy your next Hyundai car on Amazon in these 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - Customers in the 48 available cities can shop for new Hyundai vehicles by visiting amazon.com/autos, searching "Amazon Autos" on Amazon.com, or through the mobile app.

t: Hyundai Vehicles Available to "Add to Cart" on Amazon Autos - Hyundai Newsroom
s: Customers in the U.S. can buy new Hyundai vehicles directly on Amazon Autos and schedule pickup through participating dealers · Hyundai is the first and currently only brand available on Amazon Autos

t: You Can Finally Buy A Brand-New Hyundai On Amazon
s: December 10, 2024 - If you've been wanting to buy a ... has finally rolled out its online car buying tool for Hyundai that has been in the works for over a year. Called Amazon Autos, the tool allows car buyers to purchase a brand-new Hyundai completely online....

t: Amazon and Hyundai launch a broad, strategic partnership—including vehicle sales on Amazon.com in 2024
s: Hyundai has also selected AWS as its preferred cloud provider and next-generation Hyundai vehicles will be even more responsive and interactive with Alexa Built-in.

t: Digital experience reimagined: Hyundai launches its first European Brand Space on Amazon
s: Hyundai Motor Europe launches its first Brand Space on Amazon, aiming to redefine digital engagement and customer-centricity.

t: Digital experience reimagined: Hyundai Motor UK launches a dedicated Brand Space on Amazon
s: Hyundai Motor UK has introduced its very own Hyundai Brand Space on Amazon, aiming to transform digital engagement and enhance customer-centricity.

t: Amazon Autos Will Lease You A Brand New Hyundai - Jalopnik
s: April 16, 2025 - In its quest to further its world domination, Amazon will now allow customers to lease brand-new Hyundais on its Autos car-shopping platform.

t: Hyundai Provides a Digital "Showroom" on Amazon.com - Hyundai Newsroom
s: The new digital showroom can be found at Amazon.com/Hyundai.

t: Amazon starts selling Hyundai cars, more brands next year - Ars Technica
s: December 10, 2024 - "We're partnering with dealers and brands to redesign car shopping—making it more transparent, convenient, and customer-friendly," said Fan Jin, global head of Amazon Autos. "We're excited to have Hyundai as our exclusive launch partner and look forward to welcoming more brands and expanding ...

t: Hyundai will become the very first car brand on Amazon
s: Hyundai has revealed plans to make its vehicles available on Amazon's platform in 2024, allowing customers to purchase cars through the tech giant.

t: Amazon Auto steps into car sales with Hyundai, offers seamless buying experience
s: December 11, 2024 - Amazon’s Global Head of Amazon ... from Amazon to car shopping, one of their largest purchases, while offering dealers a new channel to connect with a broad audience.” He also highlighted Hyundai as the exclusive launch partner and expressed excitement for future brand expansions ...

t: Amazon launches retail partnership with Hyundai in 48 US cities | Automotive Dive
s: December 11, 2024 - The deal allows car-shoppers to purchase a new Hyundai vehicle on Amazon and schedule pickup at a local dealer, the retail giant announced Dec. 10. The vehicles are being offered via Amazon’s new online shopping platform “Amazon Autos,” which offers financing, extended warranty plans and trade-in options. The U.S. cities include New York, Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, Miami, Seattle, San Francisco and other major metropolitan areas. “We’re partnering with dealers and brands ...

t: Amazon Is Now Selling Hyundai Vehicles Through Amazon Autos | WIRED
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon’s partnership with Hyundai means you can use the e-retailer to purchase a brand-new car online. More manufacturers will be joining the new service, called Amazon Autos, next year.

t: Hyundai is now selling EVs on Amazon: Here's how you can snag one
s: December 11, 2024 - Amazon will continue adding more Hyundai dealerships and will offer additional brands as it expands the program next year.

t: Erfahre__Hyundai: Digitaler Brand Space auf Amazon live
